backFields.label: Tour Overview
backFields.value:
Half-day field tour of resilient infrastructure projects in Frederick County.

Sites:
• Community microgrid and solar installation
• Rainwater harvesting system
• Greywater recycling facility
• Permeable pavement demonstration
• Bioswale stormwater management

Transportation provided. Wear comfortable walking shoes.
Tour runs 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM with lunch included.

backFields.label: LIFT Priority Connection
backFields.value:
This field tour is offered to LIFT Certificate holders who selected 'Resilient Infrastructure' as a priority interest.

As a holder, you receive:
• Free access to priority learning events
• Technical briefings from project engineers
• Early access to infrastructure investments
• Site visit reports and technical data

Your LIFT Certificate phase progression is enhanced by event participation.

locations.relevantText: Infrastructure Tour departs from Bell Tower Hall at 9:00 AM
